text: The 1992 Soviet Cup Final was a football match that took place at the Luzhniki Stadium, Moscow, on 10 May 1992. The Soviet Union was in the process of being dismantled with all organizations such as the Football Federation of USSR abandoned. Therefore, the game was administered by the Russian Football Union. The match was the 51st Soviet Cup Final and it was contested by FC Spartak Moscow and PFC CSKA Moscow. The Soviet Cup winner Spartak qualified for the Cup Winners' Cup first round for the Russian Federation. Spartak played their 15th Cup Final winning on 10 occasions including this one. CSKA came to the final as the defending champions and it was their eighth Cup Final and for the third time they were defeated at this stage. == Road to Moscow == All sixteen Soviet Top League clubs did not have to go through qualification to get into the competition, so Spartak and CSKA both qualified for the competition automatically. {|width=100% |width=50% valign=top| Spartak Moscow {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font- size: 95%;" |- |Round 1 (1st leg)||align=right|Gastello||2-4||Spartak |- |Round 1 (2nd leg)||align=right|Spartak||2-1||Gastello |- | ||colspan=4 align=center|(Spartak won 6-3 on aggregate) |- |Round 2 (1st leg)||align=right|Kopetdag||0-0||Spartak |- |Round 2 (2nd leg)||align=right|Spartak||2-1||Kopetdag |- | ||colspan=4 align=center|(Spartak won 2-1 on aggregate) |- |Quarter- final||align=right|Krylya Sovetov||0-1 aet||Spartak |- |Semi- final||align=right|Lokomotiv Moscow||0-2|| Spartak |} |width=50% valign=top| CSKA Moscow {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- |Round 1 (1st leg)||align=right|Asmaral||0-2||CSKA |- |Round 1 (2nd leg)||align=right|CSKA||3-2||Asmaral |- | ||colspan=4 align=center|(CSKA won 5-2 on aggregate) |- |Round 2 (1st leg)||align=right|Pakhtakor||1-1||CSKA |- |Round 2 (2nd leg)||align=right|CSKA||3-2||Pakhtakor |- | ||colspan=4 align=center|(CSKA won 4-3 on aggregate) |- |Quarter- final||align=right|CSKA||+ - -||Chornomorets |- |Semi- final||align=right|CSKA||2-0||Pamir |} |} == Previous encounters == Previously these two teams met each other in the early editions of the competition on several occasions. However this was their first time and the last that they met in the finals of the Soviet Cup. ==Match details== {| width=92% | |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="3"|FC Spartak Moscow: |- !width="25"| |- |1 || Stanislav Cherchesov (c) |- |3 || Dmitriy Khlestov |- |4 || Andrei Ivanov |- |6 || Dmitriy Popov |- |2 || Kakhaber Tskhadadze |- |5 || Viktor Onopko |- |11 || Andrei Chernyshov |- |10 || Valeriy Karpin |- |8 || Andrei Piatnitski |- |7 || Igor Lediakhov |- |9 || Vladimir Bestschastnykh |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |14 || Dmitriy Radchenko |- |15 || Rashid Rakhimov |- |16 || Aleksandr Tatarkin |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan="3"| Oleg Romantsev |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="3"|PFC CSKA Moscow: |- !width="25"| |- |1 || Dmitriy Kharine |- |2 || Valeriy Minko |- |3 || Sergei Kolotovkin |- |4 || Dmitriy Bystrov |- |5 || Oleg Malyukov |- |6 || Mikhail Kolesnikov (c) |- |7 || Denis Mashkarin |- |8 || Aleksei Poddubskiy |- |9 || Oleg Sergeyev |- |10 || Sergey Krutov |- |11 || Lev Matveyev |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |13 || Vasili Ivanov |- |14 || Ilshat Faizulin |- |15 || Aleksandr Grishin |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan="3"| Pavel Sadyrin |} |} {| width=100% style="font-size: 90%" | width=50% valign=top| MATCH OFFICIALS *Assistant referees: ** Viktor Filippov (Moscow) ** Sergei Khusainov (Moscow) *Fourth official: ( ) | width=50% valign=top| MATCH RULES *90 minutes. *30 minutes of extra-time if necessary. *Penalty shoot-out if scores still level. *Seven named substitutes *Maximum of 3 substitutions. |} \---- {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;
